2024.title: Life Trails Created
2024.description: Started documenting life digitally. This marks the beginning of a new journey to preserve memories and family history.

2024.title: Summer Vacation
2024.description: Went on a memorable family trip to the mountains. Beautiful weather and great company made it unforgettable.

2023.title: Christmas Celebration
2023.description: Celebrated Christmas with family and friends. Exchanged gifts and shared wonderful moments together.

2023.title: Career Milestone
2023.description: Achieved a significant milestone in my professional career. Grateful for the opportunities and support.

2019.title: Graduation
2019.description: Completed college graduation. A proud moment for me and my family. Ready to embark on the next chapter of life.

2019.title: Final Project Submission
2019.description: Submitted the final year project. Months of hard work finally came to fruition.

2015.title: College Admission
2015.description: Started college journey. Excited and nervous about the new phase of education.

2006.title: First Day of School
2006.description: A memorable start to school life. Met new friends and teachers. The beginning of an educational journey.

2006.description: Joined school officially. Parents were proud and I was excited about this new adventure.
